title: Studio Carriage House - Utilities Included $1,800.00
neighborhood: hercules, pinole, san pablo, el sob
posting_body: Waterfront area- 1 block from the bay.
PG&E (electric, heat and air-conditioning), water, garbage and internet included in price of rent!
Sought after studio apartment in beautiful Hercules, CA; nestled right in between the San Francisco Bay and Napa Valley.
New flooring, fresh paint, air conditioned, refrigerator, microwave, bathtub/shower, private entrance.
Scenic location, historic architecture, walking/bike paths along the water.
This studio is perfect for one person, it's quaint and charming.
Close to many parks, public transportation, in walking distance to restaurants and grocery stores.
